Literature Review: Transcription factor dynamics play a crucial role in regulating gene expression programs in cells. The dynamic nature of transcription factors (TFs) has been extensively studied using live-cell imaging techniques, which have provided valuable insights into the transient interactions between TFs and chromatin. However, the long-term impacts of these interactions on developmental trajectories and disease progression remain unclear. In this review, we summarize our current understanding of TF dynamics and highlight key factors that govern their behavior. We also discuss how TF dynamics affect downstream transcriptional bursting and conclude with open challenges and emerging technologies that will further our understanding of transcriptional regulation.
